TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamedElement extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement

summary.span: 标识 下的元素层次结构中的元素。

span.span: Identifies an element within the hierarchy of elements under a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个页面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档包含定义元素及其*内容*位置文本运行和图形形式。Each page of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document contains a element that defines its *content* in the form of positional text runs and graphics. 通过使用文档结构元素，页[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档还可以与定义的元素*结构*中的部分、 段落、 列表、 图形，窗体页面和表。Through the use of document structure elements, pages of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document can also be associated with elements that define the *structure* of the page in the form of sections, paragraphs, lists, figures, and tables. 类用于定义的文档标记的内容和结构的各部分之间的关联。The class is used to define the associations between content and structure parts of the document markup. A是结构化元素，如位于表单元格或项目符号列表项的子级页面层次结构。A is the child of a structural element, such as a table cell or bullet list item that is located in the hierarchy of a page. A标识中的项同一页上的层次结构。A identifies an item in the hierarchy of the same page. 它是指项是结构化元素的内容。The item it refers to is the content of the structural element. 有关结构元素的详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，请参阅第 9 章和附录 E *XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about structure elements of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents, see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，每个都有子。The following example shows the use of and elements in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, each with a child. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 获取或设置为 父级提供内容的 标记层次结构中的元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element in the markup hierarchy that provides the content for the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应为相同将元素的属性引用。 should be identical to the attribute of the element to which the refers. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了几个元素，每个都有属性。The following example shows several elements, each with a attribute. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructParaStruct2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage2_structure.xaml#docstructparastruct2)]
